mng: to extinguish or put out, to go out (of a fire etc), to exterminate or wipe out, to drown

exm.mng: to place righteousness before family (idiom); ready to punish one's own family if justice demands it
to wipe out, to crush, to annihilate
to stop burning, to go out (of fire), to die out, extinguished
to put an end to, to annihilate, to cause to perish, to perish, annihilation (in quantum field theory)
